price: 37. Kaadu laqó как siibna bar astáh loonuuh, usun too waqdi ditet culan, toh Yallih dudda kinni.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓ'limūna
